name: Alaska Winter GTX Trekking Boots - Men's

Specifications.Upper Materials: Upper: Nubuck – except for black: smooth leather
Specifications.Weather Resistance: Very warm, durably waterproof GORE-TEX® lining with a high wool content
Specifications.Recommended Use: The Alaska Winter GTX® is a very warm and robust classic winter trekking boot.
Specifications.Outsole/Sole:
Sole: Hanwag IceGrip original
IceGrip sole with greater toe spring allows the foot to roll effectively
read depth: ca. 5mm Very high number of IceGrip zones (14 per shoe) the most versatile IceGrip sole, particularly effective in deep snow
Cemented construction easy to resole 
Snowshoe compatible heel
